attributes.background: Decrease the usage of plastic in general by 10% in bags and 10% in packagings (UK ONLY). Also, we would like to educate parents about plastic waste and how its damaging the environment. This is our world. This is our future.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you'd like to reduce plastic usage, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do in order reduce the amount of plastic used. 

You might like to sign one of these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/258571
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/256386
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259176
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250050

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
